# Forecasting Postive Cases

Use this tab to forecast the number of positive cases.

### Explore Country Data

1. User to select the dataset to use. 3 datasets were downloaded and stored in the data folder for quick reference. The dataset can be downloaded from https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19/tree/master/csse_covid_19_data/csse_covid_19_time_series

2. If user did not upload any dataset, the default dataset will be used (covid information caa 27 Mar 2021).
